website_summaries.verdict: The high-end Samsung EX2F point-and-shoot offers up fast lens, a swiveling OLED display, and excellent integrated Wi-Fi.

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is good at close ups because I sell online. I don't mind removing the lens cap before you can turn it on. You have to remove it anyway to take a picture! It is compact enough for a coat pocket or a purse but don't try to put it in your pants pocket. The one thing that kept it from getting 5 stars is I got no users manual with it. I'll have to try to get one from Samsung. Hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S. Thomsen

customer_reviews.title: Best camera ever!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with everything about this camera. I'm just a leisure photographer and don't know much about the technical aspects of photography but this camera seems to do it all. It takes excellent indoor photos. It also has tons of fun features to play with. The wifi works great as well. I was in the middle of no where and I happened to stop in front of a little country store that had free wifi and I was able to upload some photos to Facebook really quickly before driving off into a no wifi zone again. Can't say enough about this camera. It's great!!
customer_reviews.author: Orissa

customer_reviews.title: 1.4F lens very good and wi-fi simplies PC contection
customer_reviews.text: 1.4 F lens is the whole purpose of buying this camera and works just right when others using fleshing light in indoor ending in darker background while this camera gives a whole harmonious background photo. Wi-Fi simplifies the transmitting process in sending photos to PC without USB cable connection or taking the chip to the pc.
customer_reviews.author: Bluefield

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: You cannot - for the money - get a better camera with all the wifi features and outstanding low-light sensitivity as this camera. Just had a newborn and this camera has been a God-send to capture precious precious moments. Outstanding tilt screen and picture quality as well! Wish they could put this quality camera on a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: The lens is super sharp and the camera operation remarkably smooth
customer_reviews.text: I do not know of a more versatile point-and-shoot than this little gem with huge potential. The lens is super sharp and the camera operation remarkably smooth. The only drawbacks: tiff file missing & manual flash mode nonexistent. It saddens me immensely that Samsung phased out this model earlier with no improved new model to replace it. What a shame! Samsung, you were on right track before, what happened?
customer_reviews.author: Sun-chang Lo

customer_reviews.title: Great low light camera
customer_reviews.text: Since I do not like to use my flash in my church photography, this camera with its f-1.4 lens is perfect for the tasks. I use it all the time and therefore do not interrupt the services.
customer_reviews.author: William L. Tygret

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my Canon G12
customer_reviews.text: My G12 started to have sensor problems so I went on the hunt to find a new high end point & shoot. So far this has worked well for me. It has a nice wide angle zoom, as a travel writer I need this to shoot inside hotel rooms & cruise ship cablins. I also need the articulated screen when holding the camera above my head. The latest Canon G doesn't have either of these two features. Since everything I shoot ends up on the web I don't need lots of megapixels, or super high quailty. So far I would rank image files from this camera as very good.
customer_reviews.author: The Travel Blogger

customer_reviews.title: Amateur Photographer
customer_reviews.text: Love photography! Seeing God's world through a camera lens. Recently took pictures of bees on cone flowers on macro setting, and a Church Baptism in the river from the shore. This camera lens does a wonderful job of capturing clear pictures to minute detail. I captured the eyes of bees, water on faces, in droplets and in streaming down as people came up out of the river! Amazing detail with wonderful clarity even when zooming up close to the subjects! I just can't figure out how to view pictures on the camera without encountering error messages, hopefully I can work out that detail.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Quality build, Good IQ, Right Size
customer_reviews.text: The articulating screen is great to use, no more kneeling to get low shots, and the display is super crisp. The macro, which is always something I like to use, paired with the wide 24mm field of view lets you produce beautiful close ups. Samsung's Mobilelink pairs to an IPhone perfectly and images moved over quickly via wi-fi.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Love this Camera
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before I purchased this camera. I is everything that I hoped for and more.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been easy to use and takes womderful pictures. Especially good on red shade blues compared to my last camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very goog camera
customer_reviews.text: Good picture qualities, good lens , very good macro photos, good night photos , easy to use,good wifi ability. I like it and use it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: BILL GU

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I, in no way am a camera buff, but I really like this camera. Zoom is good, flash is good, quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: YeahMan

customer_reviews.title: The worst camera I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this camera have poor focusing capabilities, it also give a distorted image. Foreheads look abnormally large, while arms might look really short in your images. And no, I'm not a newby to cameras. This isn't user error. The pictures are very poor quality. Also, after owning it 8 months, the wi-fi option no longer works, and the video will only record in slow motion. Don't buy this camera. Maybe the other people reviewing it work for Samsung?
customer_reviews.author: Bobbins

customer_reviews.title: Samsung EX2F DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this camera and on the first day encountered defective problems. It won't turn off and the lens won't retract and remains stuck out. All this after I had purchased a battery charger and memory card specifically for this camera and now I have to return it. Buyer BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara P

customer_reviews.title: with Samsung Conversion Lens it becomes 18mm f1.4 one-of-a-kind camera
customer_reviews.text: This is just another one of cazillion great compact cameras out there, EXCEPT, it becomes one-of-a-kind with the Samsung Conversion lens. It turns the camera into a 18mm(90degree angle of view) f1.4 camera, hard to find this type of spec on a DSLR lens. Other conversion lens can't compete, as picture quality and distortion degrades fast moving away from the center. With the conversion lens-I get super wide shots(great for group pics in a room), and f1.4-low light-no need for flash, tilted viewer, silent shutter, on a compact camera, I get shots and videos that no other camera gives me.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Y

customer_reviews.title: Surpass some of the newer camera.
customer_reviews.text: The actually take a picture in extreme low light without using a flash.. Plus it can focus.. And it focus like normal even in that extreme low light. It is that good.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Price keeps going up
customer_reviews.text: Why is this camera over $120 more than last year?
customer_reviews.author: James Sparks

product_meta.title: Samsung EX2F 12.4 Megapixel Compact Camera - Black
product_meta.description: EX2 The Brightest F1.4, 24mm, 3.3x Lens Wi-Fi Connectivity Your Best Photos Instantly Shared 12.4 Megapixels, Large 1/1.7" BSI CMOS Sensor 3.0" Swivel VGA AMOLED Display
feature_bullets: Full HD 1080p Video with Stereo Sound
